translation.en: ♪ Ooh, tell the rebels And the greasers ♪ ♪ Ooh, call it sin Or call it treason ♪
No! No!
Wakey, wakey.
Here comes the tickle monster.
Come on, it's time to get up.
Good morning. Be careful, please.
Are you really gonna go all by yourself?
translation.it: Allora vai davvero? Parti da sola?

translation.en: -I still have to do it. -But aren't you afraid?
translation.it: Devo farlo comunque. Ma non hai paura?

translation.en: I'm gonna be okay.
But what if you're not back in time-- [woman] Good morning.
translation.it: - E se non tornassi in tempo… - Buongiorno.

translation.en: How you feeling today, Mia?
translation.it: - Come ti senti oggi, Mia? - Bene.

translation.en: -Fine, thanks. -Good.
translation.it: - Come ti senti oggi, Mia? - Bene. - Grazie. - Bene.

translation.en: I was thinking of having a birthday dinner for you.
translation.it: Pensavo di organizzarti una cena di compleanno.

translation.en: Eighteen. It's a big deal.
I remember just yesterday you were a scruffy teenager arriving at my house.
translation.it: Mi sembra ieri che un'adolescente trasandata arrivava a casa mia.

translation.en: Yeah. Well, thank you.
But really, I don't need anything.
translation.it: Ma davvero, non mi serve niente.

translation.en: -I really don't. -Oh, come on.
It's good for all the kids.
You're gonna be an adult.
Come on. It'll be nice.
-I'm gonna run to the library. -Okay.
translation.it: - Credo che correrò in biblioteca. - Ok.

translation.en: There are some books I wanna get.
Well, get some for when you're at the hospital too, okay?
translation.it: Prendine un po' anche per l'ospedale, ok?

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
Hey, do you think I could borrow some money
for buses and, you know, snacks?
translation.it: per gli autobus e qualcosa da mangiare?

translation.en: -Okay. -Pretty please.
-Yes, yes, yes. -You're the best.
translation.it: - Per favore… - Sì. - Lei è la migliore. - Lo so.

translation.en: -I know. -[chuckles]
translation.it: - Lei è la migliore. - Lo so.

translation.en: Thank you. I'll be back before lunch, Mrs. R.
translation.it: Grazie. Torno prima di pranzo, signora R.

translation.en: -Okay. -Thank you. Mwah.
-Bye. -Bye.
[Mrs. Rothswell] So, kids, what are we gonna do today?
[Josh] Hey, man, it's been a while.
Can you believe I've already been home for three weeks?
translation.it: Ci credi che sono a casa da tre settimane?

translation.en: I'm so bored. Come over. You can't ignore me forever.
translation.it: Mi annoio a morte. Vieni, dai. Non puoi ignorarmi per sempre.

translation.en: [mom] Morning. Cream or butter?
Thanks, Mom, but...
Right. Not hungry today either.
Hey, buddy.
Ah, well, um, we talked to Josh last night. Seems like he's doing a little bit better.
translation.it: Abbiamo parlato con Josh ieri sera. Sembra che stia un po' meglio.

translation.en: He asked us about you again and we told him--
translation.it: Ha chiesto di te e gli abbiamo detto…

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I'm gonna go see him right now.
translation.it: Lo so, sto andando da lui adesso.

translation.en: -I think he'll appreciate that. -Yeah.
translation.it: Gli farà davvero piacere. Hai risposto alla lettera della borsa di studio?

translation.en: Have you responded to the scholarship letter?
translation.it: Hai risposto alla lettera della borsa di studio?

translation.en: Come on. Kyle, they are not gonna hold your place forever. Well, then they should give it to someone else.
translation.it: - Non ti terranno il posto. - Dovrebbero darlo a qualcun altro.

translation.en: -No, this is not-- -Honey.
Honey, you have the whole summer before you have to go.
translation.it: Tesoro. Hai tutta l'estate per pensarci.

translation.en: Sign the entrance enrollment. Then see how you feel.
translation.it: Firma l'iscrizione e poi vedi come ti senti.

translation.en: I don't think I'll be back for lunch.
translation.it: Credo di non tornare a pranzo.

translation.en: Hey, here, take this with you.
Here you go.
[whispers] I don't know what to say.
[mom] Why did you have to say that again?
[dad] He can't throw away his soccer scholarship.
translation.it: Non può sprecare la borsa per il calcio.

translation.en: He didn't go to graduation, fine, but bailing on his scholarship?
translation.it: Mancare alla cerimonia del diploma è un conto, ma non accettare una borsa?

translation.en: [mom] You've got to give him more time.
It's only been a few months since the accident.
translation.it: Sono passati solo pochi mesi dall'incidente.

translation.en: -He'll come around. -I hope so.
[chuckles] Hey, you got lost or what?
translation.it: Ehi. Ti sei perso? Ti aspettavo ore fa.

translation.en: Said you're coming hours ago.
translation.it: Ti sei perso? Ti aspettavo ore fa.

translation.en: Yeah, I-I walked.
Hey, don't... [chuckles] Don't worry about it.
I know it looks bad, but it feels a lot worse.
translation.it: Sembra brutto, lo so… Ma in realtà è anche peggio.

translation.en: So, um, where have you been?
First two editions of Sun Eater.
translation.it: Le prime due edizioni di Sun Eater.

translation.en: [laughs] Thanks, dude.
You're the best.
So have you talked to them yet?
Noah's parents?
They've called a bunch of times.
They wanna talk to us.
You still can't remember?
You know, what happened before the...
Me neither.
They say it's normal.
I'm so sorry, boys, but the, um, physical therapist called,
translation.it: Scusate, ragazzi, ma ha chiamato il fisioterapista.

translation.en: he's gonna be here any minute, so I think you should...
Yeah, yeah, of course, um... [clears throat]
I-I'll come back later.
We haven't summoned the courage to tell him yet,
translation.it: Non abbiamo trovato il coraggio di dirglielo, ma…

translation.en: but he may never walk again.
It's a blessing that you didn't get more hurt than you did.
translation.it: È un miracolo che ne sia uscito indenne.

translation.en: Just... Just look at you.
There's barely a scratch on you.
And Josh, he's just broken.
And Noah...
Noah...
There's not...
There's not an hour that goes by...
Not an hour goes by that I wish he hadn't gotten into that car with you.
translation.it: Non passa ora in cui non desideri che non fosse in auto con te.

translation.en: [Josh's mom] I wish he hadn't gotten into that car with you.
translation.it: …non desideri che non fosse in auto con te.

translation.en: And Noah...
Just look at you, not a scratch on you.
translation.it: Guardati. Non hai neanche un graffio.

translation.en: He hadn't gotten into that car... Not a scratch on you.
translation.it: …non fosse venuto in auto con te. …neanche un graffio.

translation.en: [Mia] Help!
Hey! Can you hear me?
Oh. Are you all right? You passed out.
Are you feeling better?
Get it off me, get it off me! Gross! Ooh!
Oh, I'm sorry.
Oh, it's-- I-I'm usually not this hysterical.
translation.it: Di solito non sono così isterica.

translation.en: It's just that, um... When I was a kid, a lizard crawled into my bed once.
translation.it: Da piccola, una lucertola si è infilata nel mio letto.

translation.en: When you're five years old, that could be traumatizing.
translation.it: A cinque anni può essere un trauma.

translation.en: People don't scream when they're about to pass out.
translation.it: La gente non urla quando sta per svenire.

translation.en: -No? -No.
Okay, well, I'm epileptic,
and so I can always tell when I'm about to faint. And because of that, I scream because I get scared.
translation.it: Capisco sempre quando sto per svenire e urlo perché ho paura.

translation.en: Hold on. Hold on, hold on. I think that we should talk.
Just mind your own business.
No, no. Don't you get it? You are my business.
translation.it: No! Non capisci? Tu sei affar mio.

translation.en: If I let you do what I think you were about to do,
translation.it: Se ti lascio fare quella cosa,

translation.en: I will never be able to forgive myself.
And your mother would never be able to forgive me either.
translation.it: E tua madre non mi perdonerebbe mai.

translation.en: Just go home.
-No. -Fine.
No. If you jump, I'm gonna jump.
translation.it: No. Se salti tu, salto anch'io.

translation.en: What the...
Hey, stop!
Do you believe me now? Monkey see, monkey do.
translation.it: Mi credi ora? Sono una copiona.

translation.en: This has gotta be a nightmare.
-Just go away. -Never.
[gasps] Ooh, it's unlocked. -Give me my phone back. -Mm-mmm.
I'm gonna text myself so I have your number.
translation.it: Mi mando un messaggio così ho il tuo numero.

translation.en: -Who are you? -[cell phone beeps]
My name's Amelia.
Amelia Faith, but you can call me Mia.
translation.it: Amelia Faith, ma puoi chiamarmi Mia.

translation.en: -Hi. -Finally. I was getting worried.
I'm so sorry. I just-- I--
I lost track of time at the library.
Mia, just be honest with me
and you better not have your fingers crossed behind your back.
translation.it: e non incrociare le dita dietro la schiena.

translation.en: Maybe we should try another counselor.
No, come on, Lisa, it has been months and he's getting worse day after day.
translation.it: Andiamo, Lisa, sono passati mesi e non fa che peggiorare.

translation.en: And he won't talk. He won't eat.
I mean, he barely even looks at us anymore.
translation.it: Praticamente non ci guarda neanche più.

translation.en: Hey.
[Lisa] How'd it go with Josh?
[Mia] I knew it.
[woman] Hey. If it isn't my favorite foster sis.
translation.it: Ehi! La mia sorella affidataria preferita.

translation.en: How's Mrs. Rothswell doing? She's good.
translation.it: - Come sta la sig.ra Rothswell? - Bene.

translation.en: Hey, can I ask you a favor?
Can you still do your responsible mother voice?
translation.it: Faresti la tua voce da madre responsabile?

translation.en: Hi, my name is Mia.
I'm a really good friend of Kyle's. [Lisa] Oh.
translation.it: - Sono una cara amica di Kyle. - Oh.

translation.en: Him and I were having a conversation the other day,
and he said that he's obviously going through a hard time.
translation.it: e mi ha detto che è un brutto momento.

translation.en: -[Lisa] Right. -And he really felt like he needed to get away.
translation.it: - Giusto. - E sentiva il bisogno di andarsene.

translation.en: So I thought it might make you feel better if you could speak to my mom.
translation.it: Ho pensato di farla parlare con mia mamma.

translation.en: -[Lisa] Yeah. -[Kyle] Damn it!
-[woman] Oh, hi. -Hi. Hi, Mrs. Faith.
[Lisa] It's just such a surprise.
Thank you very much, Mrs. Faith.
We'll be sure to let him know.
Such an amazing offer.
Oh? Yeah, he's been going through tough times.
translation.it: Sì, sta attraversando un periodo difficile.

translation.en: Here he is now.
Oh.
Yeah. Thanks, Mom. Okay, bye.
She is so chatty.
Hey, so I was just filling your parents in on what we talked about yesterday.
translation.it: Ehi, stavo aggiornando i tuoi di quello di cui abbiamo parlato ieri.

translation.en: With you saying that you needed to get away.
translation.it: Dicevi di voler fare un viaggio.

translation.en: And my mom inviting you to spend some time with us in Spain.
translation.it: Mia madre ti invita a venire in Spagna con noi.

translation.en: She's a photographer, a really, really good one.
translation.it: Fa la fotografa. È davvero molto brava.

translation.en: And so she travels a lot, and she's been there for a week already and she says that we're just gonna love it.
translation.it: Viaggia molto, è lì da una settimana e dice che ci piacerà.

translation.en: [Lisa] She seems really nice.
But, Kyle, honey, why haven't you ever told us about Mia?
translation.it: Ma, Kyle, tesoro, perché non ci hai mai parlato di Mia?

translation.en: -Because I just-- -No, no. No, no.
You're not gonna tell them how we met, are you?
translation.it: Non rivelare come ci siamo conosciuti!

translation.en: That is so embarrassing. [laughs]
Okay, so you're saying that you wanna travel now?
Mm-hmm, he said that he would not miss it.
translation.it: Ha detto che non vedeva l'ora.

translation.en: Can I talk to Mia in private? -Mm-hmm? -Yeah.
translation.it: - Posso parlare a Mia in privato? - Sì.

translation.en: What are you doing here?
Trying to get your parents on board for you to come to Spain.
translation.it: Convinco i tuoi a farti venire in Spagna.

translation.en: -Spain? -Yes. Spain.
The place between France and Portugal.
translation.it: Tra la Francia e il Portogallo.

translation.en: Come with me for ten days. All expenses paid.
translation.it: Vieni, dieci giorni. Tutto a spese mie.

translation.en: Just get out of town for a little while. Forget it.
translation.it: - Lascia la città per un po'. - Non esiste.

translation.en: Okay, look, your parents are very nice,
translation.it: Senti, i tuoi genitori sono molto gentili,

translation.en: but they also seem very concerned for your well-being.
translation.it: ma sembrano anche molto preoccupati per te.

translation.en: I could tell them how we actually met or you could come with me.
translation.it: Posso dirgli come ci siamo conosciuti, oppure vieni con me.

translation.en: And if you still wanna kick the bucket after the trip, I won't stop you. Deal?
translation.it: Se non avrai cambiato idea dopo il viaggio, non ti fermerò. Ci stai?

translation.en: Mom, Dad. Mia's leaving.
translation.it: Mamma, papà. Mia sta andando via.

translation.en: Look, you can think about it. You don't have to decide now.
translation.it: Ok, aspetta, pensaci. Non devi decidere ora.

translation.en: You can just let me know tonight or-- or maybe tomorrow.
translation.it: Puoi farmi sapere stasera o domani.

translation.en: I'll be back.
It was really nice to meet you guys. Thank you so much.
translation.it: È stato un piacere conoscervi. Grazie infinite.

translation.en: My mom, she just wanted me to meet you guys in person.
translation.it: Mia madre ci teneva che vi incontrassi.

translation.en: There are so many, you know, crazy people out there.
translation.it: C'è tanta gente matta in giro.

translation.en: -She just... -[Lisa] Of course.
-It was a pleasure to meet you. -Really nice meeting you.
translation.it: - Piacere di averti conosciuta. - Piacere mio.

translation.en: Um, hon, just to let you know, your-your shirt's on inside out.
translation.it: Tesoro, hai notato che hai la maglietta a rovescio?

translation.en: -Oh, no, I do that on purpose. -Oh!
It makes me feel like I'm a little bit less conventional, -or something. -Oh.
translation.it: Mi fa sentire un po' meno convenzionale.

translation.en: Oh, wait. Hey, Kyle.
Don't forget to text me a picture of your passport and all that jazz.
translation.it: Ricordati di inviarmi una foto del passaporto.

translation.en: We leave in three days.
[softly] I'm gonna kill you.
[laughs] Yay. Bye.
Why do you think he never said anything about her? She's lovely.
translation.it: Perché non ci ha mai parlato di lei? È adorabile.

translation.en: He hasn't told us anything in three months.
translation.it: Sono tre mesi che non ci parla.

translation.en: Come in.
Hey, buddy. Your mom and I just finished reading this.
translation.it: Ehi. Io e tua madre abbiamo letto questo.

translation.en: We thought you might get something out of it.
Hey, you know what? I got an idea.
translation.it: Ehi, sai una cosa? Ho un'idea.

translation.en: What do you say that you and I take a soccer ball, hit the field, you can work on your PKs.
translation.it: Che ne dici se prendiamo un pallone e andiamo in campo e ti alleni ai rigori.

translation.en: I don't think you can score on me today.
No, I'm okay.
Okay. Plan B.
There is a big FIFA match tonight.
You, me, pizza. Watching it together on the couch.
translation.it: Tu, io, una pizza. Ce la guardiamo sul divano.

translation.en: Not tonight, okay?
Son...
I know what you're going through is incredibly challenging,
translation.it: so che quello che stai passando è una sfida enorme,

translation.en: but you can't stay locked up in your room day after day, hiding.
translation.it: ma i giorni passano e non puoi continuare a nasconderti qui dentro.

translation.en: Can we please not do this?
No, we are. We're gonna do this right now. You've been pushing us away for too long.
translation.it: No, non smetto. Ci stai allontanando da troppo tempo.

translation.en: Something has to change.
Do you think that if you get out of here and you go to Spain, that that's gonna help?
translation.it: Credi che uscire da qui e andare in Spagna possa farti bene?

translation.en: 'Cause if you do, I want you to go.
-No, I don't wanna go. -You don't wanna go?
What do you wanna do? You wanna stay in here for another three months, moping?
translation.it: E che vuoi fare? Vuoi restare qui dentro altri tre mesi col muso?

translation.en: -What do you want from me? -I want my son back.
translation.it: - Che vuoi da me? - Rivoglio mio figlio.

translation.en: I want you.
He's gone, Dad.
What?
[sighs] Kyle.
Here.
Go find him.
This is for you.
Looks pretty. Like you.
Do you really have to go?
Yeah.
This is my chance to get some answers, Becca.
translation.it: È la mia occasione di trovare risposte, Becca.

translation.en: I hope you can understand.
Hey, come here.
I have to tell you something really important.
My best friend once told me,
translation.it: Il mio migliore amico mi disse:

translation.en: no matter what happens, no matter where I am,
there will always be somebody somewhere who is glad you were born.
translation.it: ci sarà sempre una persona felice che tu sia venuta al mondo".

translation.en: Okay? So don't be sad.
Why are you smiling?
I just got some good news about my trip.
translation.it: Ho ricevuto buone notizie sul mio viaggio.

translation.en: [announcer on PA] Good morning, ladies and gentlemen.
On behalf of the captain and crew, we would like to welcome you aboard.
translation.it: A nome del capitano e dell'equipaggio, vi diamo il benvenuto a bordo.

translation.en: Our flight to Madrid, Spain will be 13 hours...
translation.it: Il volo per Madrid sarà di 13 ore…

translation.en: I am so excited.
I've been planning this trip for years,
but I've been thinking about it, well, forever.
translation.it: ma ci penso praticamente… da sempre.

translation.en: Have you ever had a dream and it finally comes true
translation.it: Hai mai avuto un sogno che poi si avvera

translation.en: and then you just don't know what to feel?
That is exactly what I'm feeling right now.
[announcer] Please take a moment to review the safety data card in the seat pocket in front of you.
translation.it: Consultate le informazioni di sicurezza nel sedile di fronte a voi.

translation.en: Hey, hey, maybe we ought to watch this.
To fasten your seatbelt,
insert the metal fitting one into the other,
tighten by pulling the loose ends of the straps.
translation.it: e regolate stringendo le estremità libere della cinghia.

translation.en: Should the cabin experience any pressure loss,
translation.it: In caso di perdita di pressione,

translation.en: stay calm and listen for instructions from your cabin crew.
translation.it: mantenete la calma e ascoltate le istruzioni.

translation.en: -Oxygen masks will... -Oh! Cool, thank you.
Place the mask over your mouth and nose.
translation.it: Posizionate la maschera su naso e bocca.

translation.en: If you are traveling with children,
make sure your own mask is on first before helping them.
It's my first time on an airplane.
translation.it: È la prima volta che volo.

translation.en: It's actually my first time outside of California.
translation.it: È la prima volta che lascio la California.

translation.en: Isn't that so exciting?
I've always wondered what it would be like on an airplane.
translation.it: Mi sono sempre chiesta come sarebbe stato.

translation.en: How big upper-ahead storage would be?
I thought it would be smaller than this, actually. I was pleasantly surprised.
translation.it: Me le immaginavo più piccole. Una piacevole sorpresa.

translation.en: -Oh, here it is. -Ah!
So you're the girl who booked the Tuk Tuk a year ago.
translation.it: Quindi se tu che hai prenotato il tuk-tuk un anno fa.

translation.en: -You like to plan ahead. -[Mia, surfer chuckle]
So, I guess that's Noah?
No. No, Noah couldn't make it.
translation.it: No. No, non è potuto venire.

translation.en: -Oh, okay. -Ah. But this is Kyle.
translation.it: - Oh, ok. - Ma lui è Kyle.

translation.en: -Here is his info. -[man] Bueno.
Then if you can give Noah his receipt,
translation.it: Allora, se puoi dare la ricevuta a Noah,

translation.en: then I will just add Kyle to the paperwork, and yes.
Okay, this is for you.
-Let's go see the van. -Okay.
[grunts] Here she is.
Fully equipped, exactly as advertised.
You have a kitchen, you have a stove, uh, the bed on the back,
and you also have Bluetooth connection,
if you want to listen to music while you drive. It'll be perfect. [chuckles]
translation.it: se volete ascoltare la musica mentre andate. Sarà fantastico.

translation.en: I guess that's pretty much it, so, uh, see you in ten days.
translation.it: Direi che è tutto. Quindi ci vediamo tra dieci giorni.

translation.en: Oh, could you please take care of her for me, okay?
You must be crazy if you think I'm getting in this thing with you.
translation.it: Tu sei pazza se pensi che ci salga.

translation.en: Especially with you behind the wheel.
No, I don't know how to drive.
translation.it: - Soprattutto se guidi te. - No. Io non so guidare.

translation.en: -You're driving. -The hell I am.
♪ Her hair is kinda wild and... ♪
Hey, hey. Nobody turns off my favorite song.
translation.it: Ehi! Nessuno interrompe la mia canzone preferita.

translation.en: It's a good song.
You know, on second thought,
I think that we might need to renegotiate the terms of our agreement.
translation.it: credo che dovremmo rinegoziare i termini dell'accordo.

translation.en: At this rate, I'm gonna need like a month to hit up all the places I'd like to visit.
translation.it: Di questo passo, mi ci vorrà un mese a visitare tutte le tappe dell'itinerario.

translation.en: Oh, come-- come on.
You're really not gonna ask me anything?
Nothing about this trip?
Nothing about me?
Okay, okay. We can talk about you.
Or not.
So, I bet you're wondering why I'm taking so many pictures?
translation.it: Immagino ti starai chiedendo perché faccio tante foto.

translation.en: They're for my Photolog,
"Expiration Date."
You know? Expiration date.
It's like a metaphor.
Okay. [chuckles]
How about this? I am starving.
translation.it: Senti, io sto morendo di fame.

translation.en: I bet you are too.
Okay, um, the next exit,
there's a restaurant that has 4.7 stars.
translation.it: c'è un ristorante che ha 4,7 stelle.

translation.en: Yeah, this exit.
Kyle! Kyle!
Don't ever do that again.
I'm sorry, I just thought that-- Just stop!
Stop thinking. Stop talking.
Just stop.
Okay.
I'll be inside.
[chuckles] Ah, I think you mean pollo, chicken?
-Oh, si. Pollo. -Yeah. Okay.
translation.it: - Panini? - Oh, sì. - Sì. Ok. - Panini.

translation.en: -Something else? -Uh, yeah. Uh, a muffin?
-Of course. -Por favor.
[clears throat] So are you gonna tell me what this trip's about?
translation.it: Vuoi dirmi qualcosa su questo viaggio?

translation.en: He speaks. [laughs]
Are you okay?
Do you need me to call an ambulance or something?
You must be delirious.
So?
So this trip is about finding my mom.
translation.it: Allora, questo è un viaggio per trovare mia madre.

translation.en: Finding her?
Didn't she talk to my parents about meeting us out here?
translation.it: Non ha detto ai miei che l'avremmo incontrata qui?

translation.en: No, that was, uh, that was my foster sister.
translation.it: No. Quella era la mia sorella affidataria.

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
Yeah. The thing is, is that I don't...
translation.it: Sì. Il fatto è che non…

translation.en: I don't know my mom. She left me.
translation.it: Non conosco mia madre. Mi ha abbandonato.

translation.en: Hey, but the cool thing is, is that it's my birthday.
translation.it: Ma la cosa bella è che è il mio compleanno.

translation.en: And how awesome would it be if I got to meet my mom on the day that I was born?
translation.it: E quanto sarebbe bello incontrare mia madre il giorno in cui sono nata?

translation.en: [clears throat] Happy birthday, Mia.
Thanks.
So where does this mom of yours live?
Well, over the last two years I've been doing a lot of research
translation.it: Negli ultimi due anni ho fatto parecchie ricerche

translation.en: and I came up with ten mother candidates.
The first is in Segovia.
Well, looks like you'll meet her pretty soon then.
We just passed a sign that says six kilometers to Segovia.
translation.it: Quel cartello diceva che siamo a 6 km da Segovia.

translation.en: Six kilometers?
No. No, why didn't you say something?
translation.it: No. No, perché non hai detto niente? Non posso conoscere mia madre così.

translation.en: No, I can't meet my mom like this.
translation.it: No, perché non hai detto niente? Non posso conoscere mia madre così.

translation.en: I brought my favorite shirt for her. I-I have to change.
translation.it: Ho la mia camicia preferita. Devo cambiarmi.

translation.en: I can't believe that this is finally happening right now.
-I mean, the moment is here-- -Mia, curtain!
Look, I'm sorry, I just-- This is my favorite shirt and I got it just to meet her.
translation.it: È la mia camicia preferita che ho scelto per conoscerla.

translation.en: God, get yourself together, Mia Faith.
It's getting a little late, don't you think?
translation.it: Si sta facendo tardi, non trovi?

translation.en: I mean, we shouldn't just be barging in on somebody unexpectedly at this time.
translation.it: Non dovremmo presentarci in una casa inaspettatamente a quest'ora.

translation.en: I mean, they could be having dinner.
Still pretty light out. Plus, I heard they have dinner pretty late.
translation.it: È ancora giorno. E comunque cenano tardi qui.

translation.en: No, we just landed today and I'm exhausted.
translation.it: No. Siamo arrivati oggi e sono esausta.

translation.en: You know, I booked us a place for tonight.
translation.it: Ho prenotato un campeggio per stasera.

translation.en: Maybe we could go there and get some rest,
translation.it: Potremmo andare a riposarci un po'

translation.en: and then we can go meet her tomorrow.
Happy birthday, Mia.
Oh, come on. Don't tell me that you like to sleep in.
translation.it: Non dirmi che ti piace dormire la mattina.

translation.en: No. No, no.
-[line ringing] -Come on.
Pick up.
What? Where were you?
Oh, good morning to you too.
I was taking a shower, and on my way back, I got us some breakfast.
translation.it: Ho fatto una doccia. E tornando ho preso la colazione.

translation.en: And you just took all your stuff with you to go take a shower?
translation.it: E ti sei portato tutto dietro alle docce?

translation.en: Oh, actually, yes.
You were out cold, I don't wanna be grabbing stuff out of my bag, making noise.
translation.it: Dormivi come un sasso. Non volevo fare rumore con la borsa.

translation.en: Oh, so you weren't planning on leaving me and just taking off?
translation.it: Quindi non volevi abbandonarmi qui e andartene?

translation.en: Of course not. Deal's a deal, right?
translation.it: Certo che no. I patti sono patti, no?

translation.en: Hey, watch the chocolate.
Thank you.
Thank you for staying.
[Mia] Ah! No, no, no. How did that happen?
I spilled the hot chocolate.
I'm such a klutz, I spilled it everywhere.
I'm so sorry.
What am I supposed to do?
I can't show up to meet my mom like this.
translation.it: Non posso presentarmi a mia madre così.

translation.en: Oh, man.
I can't believe this happened.
This is my favorite shirt and I really wanted to wear it.
translation.it: È la mia camicia preferita e volevo indossarla.

translation.en: [Kyle] Hang on. I think I got an idea.
[Mia] Why are you stopping?
Come on. We gotta get you some new clothes.
No, I'm fine, really, I'll figure something out.
"I'll figure something out." I'm not lending you my clothes.
translation.it: "Mi inventerò qualcosa". Non ti presterò i miei vestiti.

translation.en: I can't.
Really, I'm on a very tight budget this trip.
Well, consider it a belated birthday gift.
translation.it: Sarà il mio regalo di compleanno.

translation.en: -No. No, I can't accept it. -Of course you can.
translation.it: No. - Non posso accettare. - Sì che puoi.

translation.en: Plus, my dad gave me his credit card and if he sees I'm not spending any money out here,
translation.it: Mio padre mi ha dato la carta di credito e se vede che non spendo…

translation.en: then I don't know, he'll call the embassy or something.
translation.it: Mio padre mi ha dato la carta di credito e se vede che non spendo… chiama l'ambasciata.

translation.en: Okay, fine. Whatever.
translation.it: Ok, va bene. Come ti pare.

translation.en: You're crazy. Did you buy the entire store?
translation.it: Tu sei matto. Hai svaligiato il negozio?

translation.en: You need clothes. I couldn't make up my mind.
Okay, but I'm paying you back every penny.
translation.it: Ok, ma ti restituirò ogni centesimo.

translation.en: Thank you.
You're not wearing your clothes inside out.
translation.it: Non li hai messi a rovescio.

translation.en: What for? They're new.
What's this?
Yeah, yeah, I know. You can't accept it, but it's my birthday gift to you.
translation.it: Non puoi accettare, lo so. Ma è il mio regalo.

translation.en: Happy birthday.
Oh! Thank you.
What do you think? Too big. Let's go get you new ones.
translation.it: - Che ne dici? - Troppo grandi. Cambiamoli.

translation.en: No. No, I love them.
I've never had any before.
Ray-Bans? It doesn't get more classic than that.
No. Sunglasses.
Okay, one down.
Which means we're one mother closer. Right?
translation.it: Vale a dire una in meno alla meta.

translation.en: It's still pretty early.
Got a lot of rounds to make. What's the next address?
translation.it: Ne abbiamo di giri da fare. Il prossimo indirizzo?

translation.en: -No luck? -No.
Uh, the... My mom asked for pictures.
I just thought she'd liked the street, thought it was pretty.
translation.it: Pensavo le sarebbe piaciuta questa stradina.

translation.en: Oh, and here I thought you wanted to immortalize me
in one of your drawings and needed my picture as a model.
translation.it: in un disegno e ti servisse la mia foto.

translation.en: Silly me.
Oh. Wow.
Nice moves.
Too bad those kids aren't scouts. You could get a scholarship.
translation.it: Peccato non siano talent scout. Ti darebbero una borsa di studio.

translation.en: I had a scholarship but I didn't sign the paperwork.
translation.it: Ce l'avevo, ma non ho firmato i documenti.

translation.en: Why not?
Got tricked to going into Spain with some girl trying to meet her mom.
translation.it: Una tizia mi ha convinto a venire in Spagna a cercare la madre.

translation.en: [Kyle] Let's get a nice lunch on me.
-What are those? -Just my vitamins.
-Hmm. You know what I don't get? -Hmm?
How the heck you were planning on making this trip work
translation.it: Come pensavi di fare questo viaggio

translation.en: if you don't know how to drive?
My best friend was supposed to come.
translation.it: Doveva venire il mio migliore amico.

translation.en: He really wanted to help me find my mom, but he couldn't make it.
translation.it: Voleva aiutarmi a trovare mia madre, ma non è potuto venire.

translation.en: And you still have to tell me
how you came up with this hit list of mother candidates.
translation.it: come hai redatto questa lista di candidate madri.

translation.en: Okay, so my former foster brother turned hacker helped me look into it.
translation.it: Il mio ex fratello affidatario, ora hacker, mi ha aiutato a indagare.

translation.en: She's from Spain
and she was a former exchange student in California.
translation.it: che fece uno scambio studentesco in California.

translation.en: You know, he actually helped me find this.
translation.it: Mi ha aiutato a trovare questo.

translation.en: So what, you just like searched up every woman with this name in Spain?
translation.it: Hai cercato tutte le donne con questo nome in Spagna?

translation.en: Yeah. And the States too.
translation.it: Sì. E anche negli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: Fortunately there weren't many women with that last name.
translation.it: Per fortuna non sono tante con quel cognome.

translation.en: That, and then Spanish women, they actually never lose their maiden names.
translation.it: E le donne spagnole non perdono mai il cognome da nubile.

translation.en: I just got really fed up with all the unanswered questions.
translation.it: Sono stufa di tutte queste domande senza risposta.

translation.en: Who was she? What happened to her?
translation.it: Chi era? Cosa le è successo?

translation.en: What's her family like?
What's my family like?
This is the only thing I have of hers.
translation.it: Questa è l'unica cosa che ho di lei.

translation.en: [Kyle] That's really pretty.
Yeah.
And at least you have like foster siblings, right?
translation.it: Ma almeno hai dei fratelli affidatari, giusto?

translation.en: Twenty-four.
I moved around a lot.
Twelve different homes in my 18 years in the system.
translation.it: Dodici case in 18 anni nel sistema.

translation.en: That's a lot of homes.
Yeah, but none of them are real homes.
translation.it: Già, ma nessuna può chiamarsi davvero casa.

translation.en: Not like yours.
I've officially aged out of the system now anyway.
translation.it: Ora sono ufficialmente fuori dal sistema.

translation.en: But Mrs. Rothswell did say that I could stay with her until I go to college.
translation.it: Ma la sig.ra Rothswell mi lascia stare con lei fino al college.

translation.en: [both] Gracias.
Oh, what are you doing? I said I was gonna pay. I just wanna see how much I owe you.
translation.it: - Che fai? Pago io. - Voglio vedere quanto ti devo.

translation.en: No. "My treat" means you don't have to pay for it. I know that's what it means. I just--
translation.it: - "Offro io" vuol dire che non paghi. - So cosa vuol dire.

translation.en: -Oh, sorry. -Um. No, it's okay.
Noah Green is your friend that was supposed to come on this trip
translation.it: Noah Green è l'amico che doveva venire con te.

translation.en: and you didn't think to mention that fact to me? What is this? Some kind of sick joke?
translation.it: E non me lo dici? È una specie di scherzo perverso?

translation.en: No. No, he was my best friend.
translation.it: No. Era il mio migliore amico.

translation.en: He set this whole trip up.
And you choose to bring me.
translation.it: E hai scelto me al suo posto.

translation.en: The reason he's gone.
What do you want from me?
I don't know.
I recognized you at the park and when I saw you about to jump, I...
translation.it: Ti ho riconosciuto quel giorno e quando stavi per saltare…

translation.en: I thought that I could help you.
I thought that maybe we could help each other.
Kyle, I am so sorry.
We met in photography class a few summers ago.
translation.it: Ci siamo conosciuti al corso di fotografia. Qualche estate fa.

translation.en: We just hit it off instantly.
He bought the plane tickets.
He helped me save my money.
[chuckles] He even found the van.
We were in the, uh, the same grade growing up.
translation.it: Da ragazzini eravamo in classe insieme.

translation.en: I remember... playing freeze tag.
And in first grade, we were on the same soccer team,
translation.it: E in prima elementare eravamo in squadra insieme.

translation.en: but, um... he stopped playing.
And then, uh, we-- we'd see each other in the halls...
translation.it: E poi, ci vedevamo nei corridoi,

translation.en: and-- and nod, and... that was it.
I wish I had known him better.
He was a one of a kind human.
This says that the sand dunes are unmissable
translation.it: Dice che le dune di sabbia sono imperdibili

translation.en: and that there's gonna be a meteor shower tonight.
translation.it: e ci sarà una pioggia di meteoriti.

translation.en: No habla Español. English?
-American? -Si, American.
[in English] License and registration.
Oh, yes. Yes.
Did you know why I pulled you over?
You were driving too slow.
Too slow.
First time, warning.
Second time, fine.
-Okay. -Okay?
Okay, okay.
Hola!
You have to be the only person under 80
translation.it: Devi essere l'unica persona sotto gli 80 anni

translation.en: to be stopped for driving too slow.
translation.it: mai fermata per guida troppo lenta.

translation.en: Let's go, gramps. Vamos!
Can you smell it?
I've died and gone to Venus.
translation.it: Sono morta e sono su Venere.

translation.en: You're certainly from out of this world, so makes a lot of sense.
translation.it: Di sicuro non sei di questo mondo, quindi torna tutto.

translation.en: [chuckles] Let's get in the water.
Are you nuts? In your clothes?
Oh, come on! Come on, live a little.
translation.it: Dai, andiamo! Lasciati un po' andare!

translation.en: Come on.
I think we should have dinner before we miss the meteor shower.
translation.it: Ceniamo ora o perderemo la pioggia di meteoriti.

translation.en: Yeah.
You-- You are such a jerk! Get out of here! [laughs]
[Mia] What's your favorite place in the universe?
Mine is Venus.
I wish I could just think about being there
translation.it: Se solo bastasse pensare di essere lì e bum…

translation.en: and boom, I'm there.
translation.it: Se solo bastasse pensare di essere lì e bum… ci sei.

translation.en: What's your deal with Venus? Why you like it so much?
translation.it: Perché Venere? Cosa ti piace così tanto?

translation.en: On my Venus, there's no war,
translation.it: Sul mio pianeta Venere non c'è guerra,

translation.en: no pain or hunger.
On my Venus, there aren't parents who don't love their children,
translation.it: Sul mio Venere, non ci sono genitori che non amano i figli…

translation.en: or even...
Death?
Death isn't such a scary thing, Kyle.
translation.it: La morte non è così spaventosa, Kyle.

translation.en: You know when you're dead...
you can't laugh anymore,
or hang out with your friends,
translation.it: né stare coi tuoi amici, né…

translation.en: or fall in love,
or eat a hamburger.
Death sucks.
It was an accident.
I lost control of the car.
It was me.
I was the one that was behind the wheel.
And I wasn't even supposed to be driving Josh's car.
translation.it: Non dovevo neanche guidarla l'auto di Josh.

translation.en: Kyle, Noah would not wanna see you like this.
translation.it: Kyle… Noah non vorrebbe vederti così.

translation.en: I don't know that.
And you can't ask him.
And it's not even just Noah.
translation.it: E non è neanche solo Noah.

translation.en: My friend Josh,
I don't know if he'll ever walk again.
Who can live with that?
Not me.
Kyle, there has to be a reason that you made it out okay when the others didn't.
translation.it: Dev'esserci un motivo per cui tu ti sei salvato e gli altri no.

translation.en: This world, it can be really harsh
and really bad things can happen,
but you cannot give up because you made a mistake.
translation.it: Ma non puoi arrenderti per un errore.

translation.en: You've been given a second chance to make a difference in this world.
translation.it: Hai una seconda possibilità di migliorare le cose.

translation.en: It's all in how you look at it.
translation.it: Tutto sta nel come la prendi.

translation.en: I could be really upset that my mom left me.
translation.it: Io potrei essere offesa con mia madre.

translation.en: Or I could just be happy that she even had me.
translation.it: O semplicemente felice che mi abbia messa al mondo.

translation.en: I wish I never existed.
Hey.
Noah used to tell me,
"There will always be somebody somewhere
translation.it: che ci sarà sempre una persona, da qualche parte,

translation.en: who is happy that you were born."
translation.it: felice che tu sia venuto al mondo.

translation.en: Kyle? [gasping]
Hey! Hey, it's been two hours. When on Earth are you gonna tell me something?
translation.it: Ehi, sono passate due ore. Quando mi direte qualcosa?

translation.en: Uh, are you with Amelia Faith?
-Yeah. Is she okay? -Yes. Yes, don't worry.
It happens with people in her condition. We are discharging her now.
translation.it: Succede nelle sue condizioni. La stiamo dimettendo.

translation.en: Wait, wait, what condition?
Oh, I thought...
Well, in that case, it's better if she tells you herself.
translation.it: In tal caso, è meglio se glielo dice lei.

translation.en: Hey. Hey, are you okay?
What condition was that doctor talking about, Mia?
translation.it: Di che malattia parlava il dottore, Mia?

translation.en: I'm fine. Just forgot to take my pill.
translation.it: Ho dimenticato di prendere la pillola.

translation.en: Yeah, your vitamins. When are you gonna tell me what's actually going on?
translation.it: Già… le vitamine? Quando pensi di dirmi che succede?

translation.en: Okay, what's going on is that I have a genetic heart defect.
translation.it: Ok, la malattia di cui parlava è una cardiopatia genetica.

translation.en: There. Boom.
So it's fine. I'm releasing you from our agreement.
translation.it: A posto. Sei libero dal nostro accordo.

translation.en: No, no, I'm-- I'm not gonna just up and leave you.
translation.it: No, non ho intenzione di lasciarti.

translation.en: We had a deal, right?
It's fine. I'm used to it by now.
translation.it: - Abbiamo un patto. - Tranquillo. Ci sono abituata.

translation.en: You have an awesome chauffeur
translation.it: Hai un autista di tutto rispetto

translation.en: for the next couple of days, so come on.
translation.it: per i prossimi giorni, quindi andiamo.

translation.en: Mrs. Rothswell?
There's something I have to tell you.
Okay. Who are you avoiding?
My foster mom.
[Kyle] Why?
[Mia] I kind of ran away.
And that I didn't tell her where I was going.
Why not?
Because Mrs. Rothswell wanted me to stay home and have the surgery.
translation.it: Perché voleva che restassi e mi operassi.

translation.en: Wait, hold on. What surgery?
I had an operation scheduled for this week.
You decided to travel to Spain instead?
translation.it: E invece hai deciso di andare in Spagna?

translation.en: My doctor said it was perfectly safe for me to travel.
translation.it: Il mio medico ha detto che era sicuro.

translation.en: And what's the point of waiting my entire life
translation.it: E che senso ha aspettare tutta la vita

translation.en: just to die on an operating table before I get to meet my mom?
translation.it: di morire su un tavolo operatorio prima di incontrare mia madre?

translation.en: How dangerous is the surgery?
Half of the people die, but half of them live.
translation.it: La metà della gente muore. Ma l'altra metà vive.

translation.en: Are you, uh... Are you scared?
Death has never really scared me.
translation.it: La morte non mi ha mai spaventata.

translation.en: Then what are you afraid of, Mia Faith?
translation.it: Allora di cosa hai paura, Mia Faith?

translation.en: I guess what I'm afraid of is dying invisible.
translation.it: Credo che la mia paura sia morire invisibile.

translation.en: If you don't make a difference in somebody's life,
translation.it: Se non migliori la vita di qualcuno,

translation.en: if you don't even try to change the world, then what's the point of ever being born?
translation.it: se non provi nemmeno a cambiare il mondo, allora che senso ha nascere?

translation.en: Of ever living?
-Hence your Photolog. -Yeah, I guess.
-Okay, so how many views? -No idea.
translation.it: - Ok, quante visualizzazioni? - Non ne ho idea.

translation.en: -Seriously? -Yeah.
-Give me your phone. -[laughs]
Okay.
[Kyle] Hmm, oh. No wonder here.
Your account was on private.
Why didn't you tell me about your heart?
translation.it: Perché non me ne hai parlato? Del cuore?

translation.en: I guess I just...
I wanted to see what it would feel like to be a normal girl for once.
translation.it: cosa si prova a essere una ragazza normale per una volta.

translation.en: [Mia] Hold it.
You're seriously taking pictures right now? Come on, we've got moms to meet. Let's go.
translation.it: - Veramente mi fotografi? - Su, le mamme ci aspettano.

translation.en: [Kyle] Well, this is the last mother.
She has to be the one.
I guess our journey ends here.
Um, you know, you're-- you and your mom are probably gonna have a lot to talk about.
translation.it: Tu e tua madre avrete molto di cui parlare.

translation.en: So in case I don't get another chance to tell you, I just--
translation.it: In caso non avessi modo di dirtelo…

translation.en: Wait, um...
Let's just enjoy this moment.
-Wait, hi! Hi! -Excuse me. -Excuse me. -Hi. Hi.
Si?
Maria Astilleros?
I'm sorry to bother you. Do you speak English? [in English] Uh, little rusty.
translation.it: - Scusi il disturbo. Parla inglese? - Non benissimo.

translation.en: I haven't really practiced
since I was an exchange student in the USA...
translation.it: da uno scambio studentesco negli Stati Uniti…

translation.en: a long time ago in New York.
translation.it: Molto tempo fa a New York.

translation.en: Wait, did you say, um, New York?
Oh, I...
We were looking for somebody, but, um... but we were wrong.
translation.it: Cerchiamo una persona, ma… ci siamo sbagliati.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
[Kyle] Excuse us. Thank you so much. We're looking for someone else.
translation.it: Ci scusi. Grazie, cerchiamo un'altra persona.

translation.en: -Sorry. -Okay.
It's not her.
-Mia... -Kyle, I...
I just need some space.
But...
Mia's phone. Please leave a message after the beep.
translation.it: Sono Mia. Lasciate un messaggio dopo il bip.

translation.en: -[beep] -Mia, where are you?
I've been waiting a long time. Please answer.
Have you guys, um, seen, uh, blonde hair, uh, uh...
Mia's phone. Please leave a message after the beep.
translation.it: Sono Mia. Lasciate un messaggio dopo il bip.

translation.en: The next campsite is two hours away.
translation.it: Il prossimo campeggio è a due ore.

translation.en: I got a better idea.
[receptionist] Let me check if there are any available rooms.
translation.it: Vediamo se ci sono camere disponibili.

translation.en: Mia, look.
It's beautiful.
You are in luck. We just had a cancellation.
It's a room with a king size bed.
Okay.
Whoa!
[laughing] Kyle, this is crazy nice.
Wow. It's so beautiful.
This room is amazing!
This is so cool!
This is bigger than my whole house. [laughs]
translation.it: È più grande di tutta casa mia!

translation.en: This is so nice.
What's up here? [gasps]
Oh, my God.
[squeaks] It has a claw-foot tub. I love claw-foot tu-- [gasps]
translation.it: Una vasca coi piedini! Adoro le vasche…

translation.en: Oh, and a nice cozy robe.
Oh, that's so nice.
Hey, do you mind if I take a bath before dinner?
translation.it: Ti spiace se faccio un bagno prima di cena?

translation.en: No, of course not.
I'll go call my parents and get us a table.
translation.it: Chiamo i miei e prendo un tavolo.

translation.en: Okay.
Hi, Mrs. Rothswell.
I know, I know.
I'm sorry. I didn't mean to scare you.
Yeah, Yeah, I'm fine.
No, I-I haven't found her yet.
Yeah. Yeah, it's still ticking.
translation.it: È qui nel petto, batte ancora.

translation.en: Sorry, I dozed off.
All too much excitement for one day, I guess.
-Nice dress, by the way. -Thank you.
Um, I-I-I wasn't sure what you wanted, so...
Thanks.
So, uh, listen, uh, before we go home tomorrow,
translation.it: Senti, prima di tornare a casa domani,

translation.en: maybe we could do some sightseeing,
translation.it: potremmo fare un giro, andare in un bel ristorante.

translation.en: -go to a nice restaurant-- -Home?
translation.it: potremmo fare un giro, andare in un bel ristorante. A casa?

translation.en: No, I can't go home. I have to keep looking.
translation.it: Non posso tornare a casa. Continuerò a cercare.

translation.en: For what? I mean, we found all the names on the list.
Yeah, yeah, but maybe I made a mistake or something.
translation.it: Sì. - Ma forse ho fatto un errore. - Sei seria?

translation.en: You can't be serious?
translation.it: - Ma forse ho fatto un errore. - Sei seria?

translation.en: Mia, listen, you have to go home.
translation.it: Mia, ascolta, devi andare a casa.

translation.en: You need this operation. This isn't some kind of game.
translation.it: L'intervento ti serve, non è un gioco.

translation.en: I know, but I have to keep looking.
You can't keep putting your life on the line looking for someone who...
translation.it: Non puoi rischiare la tua vita cercando una persona che…

translation.en: who might not wanna be found.
You've done your best, Mia.
translation.it: Hai fatto del tuo meglio, Mia.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I know. You're right.
But I just wanna look her in the eyes and I wanna ask her why she didn't keep me.
translation.it: Ma voglio solo guardarla negli occhi e chiederle perché non mi ha tenuto.

translation.en: Ask her how she could just abandon me and act like I never even existed.
translation.it: Come ha potuto abbandonarmi e comportarsi come se non fossi mai esistita.

translation.en: Well, maybe she did it because it was best for you.
translation.it: Forse era la cosa migliore per te.

translation.en: Maybe she thought that you were better off with someone else.
translation.it: Pensava saresti stata più felice con qualcun altro.

translation.en: -You don't understand. -No, you don't understand.
translation.it: - Tu non capisci. - No, sei tu che non capisci.

translation.en: You know, maybe if you stopped obsessing over some woman
translation.it: Se smettessi di essere ossessionata da una donna che ti ha solo messa al mondo,

translation.en: who did nothing but give birth to you,
translation.it: ossessionata da una donna che ti ha solo messa al mondo,

translation.en: you'd actually start turning your attention to the people who really care about you.
translation.it: inizieresti a preoccuparti di chi ti vuole bene davvero.

translation.en: Kyle. [sighs]
I might be wrong, but I need to see this through.
translation.it: Mi sbaglierò, ma devo andare fino in fondo.

translation.en: Just give me three days, and if I don't find her,
translation.it: Dammi solo tre giorni e se non la trovo, andrò a casa a operarmi.

translation.en: I will go home and have the surgery.
translation.it: e se non la trovo, andrò a casa a operarmi.

translation.en: I promise.
Three days, Mia.
No more.
-And if anything goes wrong... -Hey.
translation.it: - E se qualcosa va storto… - Ehi.

translation.en: If anything goes wrong,
I'll see you on Venus.
[Mia] Good morning.
[Kyle] Morning.
Sorry, I didn't hear you get up. Oh, no, I didn't wanna wake you up.
translation.it: - Non ti ho sentito alzarti. - Non volevo svegliarti.

translation.en: Hey, so I've been thinking a lot about your mother.
translation.it: Allora, ho pensato tanto a tua madre.

translation.en: And, Mia, look at your mom's signature.
What does it say?
It says Maria Astilleros.
Or... what if it said Maria Ostilleros?
translation.it: E se invece… ci fosse scritto María Ostilleros?

translation.en: Look, what if the "A" was actually like an "O"
and they just mistyped it?
Oh, then I want you to look at this.
Open it.
It's the same as my necklace.
It's from that small town.
And I looked it up and there's a lot of Maria Ostilleros,
translation.it: Ho cercato e ci sono parecchie María Ostilleros.

translation.en: but there's only one that lives near there.
translation.it: Ma solo una abita lì vicino.

translation.en: [exhales sharply] Oh, my God.
And I just found an address.
You know, we still have two more hours to go.
Why don't you get some sleep?
If I see anything really interesting, I'll wake you up. All right?
translation.it: Se vedo qualcosa di interessante, ti sveglio, ok?

translation.en: [Kyle] Hey, you gotta see this.
Hey. Hey, Mia.
Mia. Mia?
Hey, Mia? Mia!
Can I please get an update on Amelia Faith?
translation.it: Mi dà notizie di Amelia Faith?

translation.en: Excuse me? Are you Amelia's friend?
translation.it: Scusa, sei tu l'amico di Amelia?

translation.en: -Yeah. Is she okay? -She's stable for now.
translation.it: - Sì. Sta bene? - Per adesso è stabile.

translation.en: However, her heart is very weak.
translation.it: Tuttavia, il suo cuore è debole.

translation.en: I understand she's scared of undergoing the surgery,
but if she doesn't, she'll die.
translation.it: ma se non la farà, morirà.

translation.en: H-How, how long do you think she can hold out for?
She's supposed to get the surgery when we get home.
She could last a month, a week.
We just don't know.
But definitely she can't fly in her condition.
Can I see her?
I need you to convince her to let us do the surgery.
Yeah. Yeah, sure, of course.
Could you take her ID to the nurse so they can fill out the paperwork?
translation.it: Puoi portare i documenti all'infermiera per la registrazione?

translation.en: Kyle? Please, you have to help me.
Why is your ticket only one-way?
translation.it: Perché hai un biglietto di sola andata?

translation.en: You never intended on having that surgery, did you?
translation.it: Non hai mai pensato di operarti.

translation.en: What was your plan, exactly?
You just keep going until you find her? Waste away until you do. If you do.
translation.it: Andare avanti finché non la trovavi? E nel frattempo deperire, senza trovarla.

translation.en: No. Kyle...
No. Tell me it isn't true.
translation.it: Ah, no? Dimmi che non è così.

translation.en: Please tell me you're gonna have that surgery.
translation.it: Ti prego, dimmi che ti farai operare.

translation.en: Damn it, Mia.
You'd rather just give up than risk what, exactly?
translation.it: Preferisci arrenderti per non rischiare… cosa?

translation.en: Having someone love you?
Or loving someone yourself?
You don't understand.
My heart has an expiration date.
translation.it: Il mio cuore ha una data di scadenza.

translation.en: Then explain that to me.
I don't want them to open my heart until I get to meet my mom.
translation.it: Non voglio che mi aprano il cuore prima di conoscere mia madre.

translation.en: What about me? What about us?
That is not fair.
I shouldn't have to choose one of you.
translation.it: Non dovrei scegliere tra lei e te.

translation.en: I-I can't do this.
Help! Help, help!
[laughing] Bro, check this. Bro, chill, I'm driving.
-[Josh] Funniest things-- -[Kyle] I'm being serious.
translation.it: - Fa morire dal ridere… - Sul serio!

translation.en: -Just look at it. -No, chill, man. Oh!
[Josh] Hey.
It's all coming back.
I'm sorry.
I'm so sorry.
I couldn't bring myself to tell you,
but it was me. It was my phone.
translation.it: ma sono stato io. È stata colpa mia.

translation.en: I was totally wasted and I showed you that video.
translation.it: Ero ubriaco e ti ho mostrato quel video.

translation.en: And-- And I looked at it.
[sniffles] And-- And I tried to get around that motorcycle.
translation.it: E ho cercato di superare quella moto.

translation.en: I-It was an accident.
So you just gotta learn from it.
And... And forgive yourself.
I'm sorry, Kyle.
Yeah, me too, Josh.
-Mia. -Kyle.
I'm so sorry.
I'm sorry too.
I can't even begin to imagine.
But I wanna be by your side,
translation.it: Ma voglio stare al tuo fianco

translation.en: and I don't care if-- if it's for an hour or-- or for years.
translation.it: e non m'importa se è per un'ora o per anni.

translation.en: It don't matter. As long as I'm with you.
translation.it: Non importa. Mi basta stare con te.

translation.en: I'm gonna take you to meet your mom.
[sobs] Really? Aw.
I just need a couple of hours.
translation.it: Mi servono solo un paio d'ore.

translation.en: But I need you to promise me something.
I need you to promise me that you'll fight.
That we'll-- we'll come back and you'll have the operation
translation.it: Che torneremo qui, ti farai operare

translation.en: and you'll do everything you can to get through this...
translation.it: e farai tutto il possibile per farcela…

translation.en: [sniffles] ...for us.
[softly] Okay.
[Mia laughs] Okay.
Thank you.
I love you.
I love you too.
-Hola? -Hi.
Hi. Can I help you?
Yeah.
I came all the way from the United States because I'm looking for my mom
translation.it: Io vengo dagli Stati Uniti perché sto cercando mia madre

translation.en: and I was wondering if maybe you recognize this.
translation.it: e mi chiedevo se riconoscesse questo.

translation.en: [sobbing] Hola, Mama.
[sobbing] Amelia.
[Kyle] Right, one more thing, then we'll head back.
It's amazing.
If things didn't work out with your mom, this was my backup plan.
translation.it: Era il mio piano di riserva se non fosse andata bene.

translation.en: I waited for that moment for so long
translation.it: Ho aspettato così tanto quel momento…

translation.en: and I had so many questions,
translation.it: e avevo tante di quelle domande.

translation.en: but when I got to that door today, none of it mattered.
translation.it: Ma oggi non mi importava più di niente.

translation.en: All I could think about was you.
Oh, and one more thing.
[laughs] My song?
May I have this dance?
Yes, you may.
I'm scared.
I'll be right by your side, Mia.
translation.it: Io sarò lì al tuo fianco, Mia.

translation.en: This is all your fault.
I was never afraid to die before I met you.
translation.it: Non avevo paura di morire prima di conoscerti.

translation.en: I don't wanna miss this.
-Mia? Mia! -[gasping]
No, no, no, no.
-Mia? Mia? -[gasping]
[Kyle] Some people change your life forever.
translation.it: Alcune persone ti cambiano la vita per sempre.

translation.en: Some people make you strive to be a better person.
translation.it: Alcune persone ti fanno venire voglia di essere migliore.

translation.en: Some people help you find yourself right when you're ready to give up.
translation.it: Alcune persone ti aiutano a ritrovarti quando stai per arrenderti.

translation.en: Some people aren't invisible.
Now, someone special once told me,
translation.it: Una persona speciale una volta mi ha detto

translation.en: there will always be somebody somewhere
translation.it: che ci sarà sempre qualcuno, da qualche parte,

translation.en: who is happy that you were born.
translation.it: felice che tu sia venuto al mondo.

translation.en: [Kyle] Well, this is it.
Please, uh, be careful driving. Are you sure it's safe?
translation.it: Ti prego, guida con prudenza. Sicuro che sia sicuro?

translation.en: Yes, it's not like this is my first road trip, Mom.
translation.it: Non è il mio primo viaggio on the road.

translation.en: I am proud of you, son.
-You take care of yourself. -Yeah.
Okay. Get out of here.
You only got two weeks to get to Boston, so...
translation.it: Hai due settimane per arrivare a Boston…

translation.en: You sure you can drive this thing? It's harder than it looks.
translation.it: Sicura di saperlo guidare? È peggio di come sembra.

translation.en: I had a pretty good teacher.
♪ There's something About her hand holding mine ♪
[Mia] I thought my trip to Spain was about my past,
translation.it: Credevo il mio viaggio in Spagna riguardasse il passato,

translation.en: but it was really about my future.
translation.it: ma in realtà riguardava il futuro.

translation.en: To find someone who makes my heart so full
translation.it: Trovare qualcuno che mi riempisse il cuore fino a farlo scoppiare,

translation.en: that it could burst, but in a good way.
translation.it: Trovare qualcuno che mi riempisse il cuore fino a farlo scoppiare, in senso buono.

translation.en: I've always looked at Venus as a place,
translation.it: Ho sempre considerato Venere un luogo.

translation.en: but it turns out my Venus was a person,
translation.it: Ora so che il mio Venere era una persona.

translation.en: and not the person I thought it would be. One who made life worth fighting for.
translation.it: E non quella che pensavo io. Quella che ha reso la mia vita importante.

translation.en: Put your hands on the steering wheel. Okay.
[Mia] This right here, this is what it must be like on Venus.
translation.it: È così che ci si deve sentire su Venere.
